com.yandex.money.api.net

Class ParametersBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yandex.money.api.net.ParametersBuffer

  • public final class ParametersBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    Buffers request parameters and creates request body for different methods. It also encodes keys and values if needed using UTF-8 charset.

    • Constructor Summary

      ParametersBuffer()

      • setParameters

        public ParametersBuffer setParameters(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
        Sets parameters.
        Parameters:
        params - key-value pairs of parameters (not null)
        Returns:
        itself

      • prepareGet

        public java.lang.String prepareGet()
        Prepares part of url for get request.

        For example, there are two parameters provided:

        Map<String, String> params = new HashMap<>();
        params.put("key1", "value1");
        params.put("key2", "value2");

        Then the method will return a string "?key1=value1&key2=value2".

        Returns:
        url parameters

      • prepareBytes

        public byte[] prepareBytes()
        Prepares parameters for a request as bytes.

        For example, there are two parameters provided:

        Map<String, String> params = new HashMap<>();
        params.put("key1", "value1");
        params.put("key2", "value2");

        Then the method will return byte array containing "?key1=value1&key2=value2".

        Returns:
        byte array of parameters
